description: Extract cache management into a dedicated, configurable service layer
steps: Create a CacheManager service with configurable TTL strategies
Move hardcoded cache keys (artist_availability_, album_availability_, integrated_search_, enhanced_search_) to a constants file
Replace manual cache get/set calls scattered across lidarr-navidrome.ts with decorator pattern or wrapper functions
Add cache invalidation methods for when data changes (playlists updated, preferences changed)
Implement cache size limits and eviction policies
